page.title: 03MADDERMARKET THEATRE NORWICH
page.content: { Since 1921 the Maddermarket Theatre has been the home of the{NORWICH {PLAYERS.}The theatre is a reconstructionof an Elizabethan theatre, and was founded by{NUGENT {MONCK}who was also the first producer of the players. He died in 1958. The Norwich Players produce a wide variety of plays and other entertain- ments including Old Time Music Halls, modern and classic dramas and pantomimes. They are best known for their{SHAKESPEARE}productions, having performed all of his plays on the open stage much in the style of the original productions. The building itself was once a Roman Catholic chapel, but now houses the small theatre and a coffee lounge.
